text: [Year 1279 AN] [Shadow Realm Research Center]
Scien!
Yes?
Has the second protype awakened it's Xuir Arts yet?
Not yet, sir.
Then it's likely another failure.
Prepare the new extraction room, I might as well get some life energy from this.
And who knows, the torture might awaken one of it's arts.
Sir...
Sir... I will not.
You dare defy my orders?
I've worked at this research center for the past seven years, but I can no longer handle this suffering.
I will likely die, but atleast this will reduce the suffering of others.
I've suspected that you'd betray me.
Don't think that I haven't noticed that the Forbidden Ritual you had given was fake.
You attempted the Forbidden Ritual of Nation!?
The only reason you're still alive is because of your of your efficiency, though it seems that you'll no longer cooperate with us.
It's a shame that I'll have to kill you now. The only other person that could replace you is Break, and let's say that I'm not his biggest fan.
It's been eight painful years since you destroyed my town for the Forbidden Ritual...
For these eight years, I've lacked the courage to stop the pain, to not continue to work with you...
I should have done this earlier, but it is something I can no longer live with.
Though it will not make up for my past actions, I will do everything I can to save even one soul from this place.
(Scien grabs a young child)
What do you think you're doing!?
If he stays here, he will die in three days when the extraction finishes. With this, he will have a chance of surival.
(Scien activates a device)
BREAK! DEACTIVATE THE DEVICE!

speaker: right
text: The device seems to be malfunctioning...
Wait, does that mean...
You fool! There's no way you'll survive with a broken teleporter! Who knows where it'll take you.
You'll probably starve in the middle of the ocean.
If so, I will accept that fate as punishment.
(The teleporter activates and Scien disappears with the child)
They got away, what a waste of resources...
